response.overview: The 2025 Battleground, also promoted as Battleground: Tampa, is an upcoming professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It will be the third annual Battleground held for the promotion's developmental brand NXT and the eighth Battleground overall. The event will take place on Sunday, May 25, 2025, at the Yuengling Centre in Tampa, Florida, and will air via WWE's live streaming platforms, marking the first Battleground to air on Netflix internationally.  The event will be held on the same day as Double or Nothing, a pay-per-view event produced by All Elite Wrestling (AEW).
response.title: NXT Battleground 2025
